title: 装备架动作教程（有个小地图给大家玩玩）
author: pca006132
txt_content:
本帖最后由 pca006132 于 2016-1-10 18:02 编辑 

第一页：教程
第二页：地图的用法
第三页：地图中的指令（提示：很多命令，有问题的话在留言问我）
如果有说的不清楚之处，请告诉我（那些计分板我就不会解释了，因为已经有很多教程了）

————————————————————————————
为什么要用装备架呢？
装备架能够调整（旋转）身体部位，可以隐形（AS本身，不包括装备）等，所以你可以得到一些挺有趣的效果

AS（装备架）的装饰（身上的装备）
首先，你要做个AS的动画，前提是你的AS要有装备，否则就不好看了
怎么弄装备呢？很简单
summon ArmorStand (x,y,z的坐标） （数据标签）
在数据标签的部分，{Equipment:[{},{},{},{},{}]}就是装备的格式
第一个“{}”就是被拿着的物品的格式（前提是那个AS有手和那个物品能用/give指令得到）
第二个"{}"就是脚部的装备的格式
第三个“{}”就是腿部的装备的格式
第四个“{}”就是胸甲的格式
第五个“{}”就是头部带着的物品（能以方块形式存在，能以/give指令得到的）的格式

那个物品的格式是怎样的呢？
基本的有：
“id:”+ 物品名称（stone之类的），界定物品的种类，e.g. id:"stone"
"Count:"+数量，界定那个物品的数量(不过通常都是1），e.g. Count:1
"Damage:"+数据值，设定它的数据值（比如羊毛的颜色,没有特殊数据值的话填0就行），e.g. Damage:0
"tag:"+别的数据标签，e.g. tag:{display:{Name:这是物品的名字}}


但是，如果你想要一些特别一点的头，比如生物/玩家的，甚至自定义的头，你该怎么办呢？
生物/玩家：
id:skull,Damage:3,Count:1,tag:{SkullOwner:（玩家名/特殊的名字）}
解释：
id:skull 就是头
Damage:3 玩家头的数据值是3，如果是其他数据值，后面的SkullOwner会无效
SkullOwner: 拥有这个头的玩家的名字（正版）
————————————————————————————————————
生物的头特别一点，Mojang为了方便玩家，特别的把一些皮肤做成某些生物的，只要在玩家名那处打出这些名字，就能使用（翻译我就不做了233)
————————————————————————————————————
生物
MHF_Alex

MHF_Ocelot

MHF_Squid

MHF_WSkeleton

方块
MHF_Cactus
MHF_Cake
MHF_Chest
MHF_CoconutB
MHF_CoconutG
MHF_Melon

MHF_Present2

MHF_ArrowUp
MHF_ArrowDown
MHF_ArrowLeft
MHF_ArrowRight

MHF_Question
————————————————————————————————————
但是，如果你想要自定义的头该怎么办？
这是其中一个自定义头的教程，这是链接
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-400684-1-1.html


让我说一说我是怎么用AS来做动画的
基本上就是一堆entitydata（调整实体数据标签的命令）和tp,来操控AS的移动/动作
比如走路，就是
{Pose:{LeftLeg:[0f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[0f,0f,0f]}} 先（把大腿并拢）
{Pose:{LeftLeg:[-40f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[40f,0f,0f]}} （左脚踏出）
{Pose:{LeftLeg:[0f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[0f,0f,0f]}} （把大腿并拢）
{Pose:{LeftLeg:[40f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[-40f,0f,0f]}} （右脚踏出）
加上tp命令令它移动

Pose的一点点心得:
pose有6个部分能够转动，而他们的数值都是一样的格式，所以我就不分开讲了。
数值: [Xf,Yf,Zf]
X:在盔甲架右边看过去，顺时针扭X度(负数的话就逆时针)
Y:在盔甲架上方看下去，顺时针扭Y度(负数的话就逆时针)
Z:在盔甲架前方看过去，顺时针扭Z度(负数的话就逆时针)
是先X，然后Y，最后Z的。
谨记，那个轴是不会改变的，一直都是右方、上方和前方三个方向的，而不是根据每个部分自己的轴来独立转动的


当然，entitydata要有延迟，如果接近是同时对同一个AS enditydata多次，它只会对最后一次有反应
我用的是1个红石刻（2个游戏刻）的延迟
——————————————————————————————————

说一下计分板在动画里的作用
——————————————————————————————————
你们可能在想，动画只要把动作的之间的延迟调准了，不就行了吗？
的确是这样，但是，如果有些动作你要做很多次，那么你就可以用计分板大法了233
——————————————准备工夫————————————————
首先，你要有那个动作的命令（execute/tp等）


然后，你要两个计分板目标（objective），设立方法如下
/scoreboard objectives add （那个目标的名字） dummy
一个控制动作的延迟，一个控制动作的种类
比如控制动作的延迟的目标叫time,控制动作的种类的目标叫action


然后，为你的动作定义分数（当AS的分数=你定义的分数时，就作出那个动作）
为不同的时间的命令定义分数（比如先tp上5格，0.5秒后再tp上5格就是不同时间的命令）
比如跳的动作的action分数是1，先tp上5格的time是1，再tp上5格的time是6


接着，每0.1秒把time的分数加1（所有AS）
把time分数=那个动作最后的命令的time分数+你想要的延迟（0.1秒为单位）
的AS的time分数设为1（可以不停的做动作）
e.g.上面那个tp的命令，最后一个执行的命令的time是6，而我想要的延迟是0.4秒，所以我们把所有action分数=1，time分数=10的AS的time分数设为1
——————————————————————————————————
最后，只要把你想要做那个动作的AS的动作分数设为那个动作的分数，控制动作的延迟的分数设为0
就可以令那个AS作出你想要的动作


连接：地图

用法：用/scoreboard players set @e[type=ArmorStand,c=1] (计分板名称，比如LegMovement) （你要的数值）
以令装备架作出动作


计分板名称/作用（用处：把装备架的这个分数调为你想要的数值和“Timer"分数调为1，便可做出你想要的动作）
LegMovement 
   1:跑步(會控制左手)
   2 : 走路
   3 : 閃避(向左,装备架的)
   4 : 閃避(向右,装备架的)
HandMovement:
   1 : 水平斬
   2 : 拔劍術
   3 : 打斜砍
   4 : 垂直砍
   5 : 揮手
   6 : 跑步
Special
   1 : 射箭（只对"PotatoGuardian”有效，生成它的命令：）
summon ArmorStand ~ ~1 ~ {NoGravity:0b,Invulnerable:1b,ShowArms:1b,DisabledSlots:0,Pose:{RightArm:[0:2.0f,1:-12.0f,2:0.0f],LeftLeg:[0:0.0f,1:0.0f,2:0.0f],Head:[0:0.0f,1:30.0f,2:0.0f],LeftArm:[0:0.0f,1:-12.0f,2:0.0f],RightLeg:[0:0.0f,1:0.0f,2:0.0f]},Invisible:0b,Rotation:[0:300.0f,1:0.0f],UUIDMost:7290639968733119821L,CustomName:"PotatoGuardian",Equipment:[0:{id:"minecraft:bow",Count:1b,Damage:0s},1:{id:"minecraft:iron_boots",Count:1b,Damage:0s},2:{id:"minecraft:iron_leggings",Count:1b,Damage:0s},3:{id:"minecraft:iron_chestplate",Count:1b,Damage:0s},4:{id:"minecraft:skull",Count:1b,tag:{SkullOwner:{Id:"0DD8BD9D-B65B-C4FF-54D8-25F98344FA68",Properties:{textures:[0:{Value:"e3RleHR1cmVzOntTS0lOOnt1cmw6Imh0dHA6Ly9pLmltZ3VyLmNvbS9xNHNIZzZtLnBuZyJ9fX0=="}]}},display:{Name:"Player Head"}},Damage:3s}],NoBasePlate:1b,CustomNameVisible:0b}?复制代码



   2 : 拋出劍(只对PM有效，生成它的命令：)
summon ArmorStand ~ ~1 ~ {NoGravity:0bPose:{RightArm:[0:-70.0f,1:0.0f,2:0.0f]},HealF:20.0f,Invisible:0b,Motion:[0:0.0d,1:-0.0784000015258789d,2:0.0d],Small:0b,Rotation:[0:-358.5005f,1:13.200003f],UUIDMost:4180367267101231262L,Equipment:[0:{},1:{id:"minecraft:diamond_boots",Count:1b,Damage:0s},2:{id:"minecraft:diamond_leggings",Count:1b,Damage:0s},3:{id:"minecraft:diamond_chestplate",Count:1b,Damage:0s},4:{id:"minecraft:skull",Count:1b,tag:{SkullOwner:{Id:"cb2671d5-90b8-4dfe-9b1c-73683d451d1a",Properties:{textures:[0:{Signature:"",Value:""}]},Name:"PotatoMaster101"}},Damage:3s}],NoBasePlate:1b,ShowArms:1}复制代码
   4 : PM出場（只对PM有效，生成它的命令：）
summon ArmorStand ~ ~1 ~ {NoGravity:0b,Invulnerable:0b,ShowArms:1b,DisabledSlots:0,Pose:{RightArm:[0:-100.0f,1:30.0f,2:-180.0f],LeftLeg:[0:0.0f,1:0.0f,2:0.0f],Head:[0:5.0f,1:0.0f,2:0.0f],LeftArm:[0:-80.0f,1:40.0f,2:0.0f],RightLeg:[0:0.0f,1:0.0f,2:0.0f]},Invisible:0b,Small:0b,Equipment:[0:{id:"minecraft:diamond_sword",Count:1b,Damage:0s},1:{id:"minecraft:diamond_boots",Count:1b,Damage:0s},2:{id:"minecraft:diamond_leggings",Count:1b,Damage:0s},3:{id:"minecraft:diamond_chestplate",Count:1b,Damage:0s},4:{id:"minecraft:skull",Count:1b,tag:{SkullOwner:{Id:"cb2671d5-90b8-4dfe-9b1c-73683d451d1a",Properties:{textures:[0:{Signature:"",Value:""}]},Name:"PotatoMaster101"}},Damage:3s}],NoBasePlate:1b}复制代码


命令：
除了setting以外，所有都要高频
那些是10hz的高频


/scoreboard objectives add TimerLeg dummy
/scoreboard objectives add LegMovement dummy
/scoreboard objectives add Timer dummy
/scoreboard objectives add HandMovement dummy
/scoreboard objectives add Special dummy

timer setting: 
scoreboard players add @e[type=ArmorStand,score_LegMovement_min=1,score_LegMovement=2] TimerLeg 1
scoreboard players set @e[type=ArmorStand,score_TimerLeg_min=9,score_LegMovement_min=1,score_LegMovement=2] TimerLeg 1

timer setting
scoreboard players add @e[type=ArmorStand,score_LegMovement_min=3,score_LegMovement=4] TimerLeg 1
scoreboard players set @e[type=ArmorStand,score_TimerLeg_min=4,score_LegMovement_min=3,score_LegMovement=4] TimerLeg 1

timer setting
scoreboard players add @e[type=ArmorStand,score_HandMovement_min=1,score_HandMovement=5] Timer 1
scoreboard players set @e[type=ArmorStand,score_Timer_min=7,score_HandMovement_min=1,score_HandMovement=5] Timer 1
scoreboard players set @e[type=ArmorStand,score_Timer_min=7,score_HandMovement_min=1,score_HandMovement=5] HandMovement 0

timer setting
scoreboard players add @e[type=ArmorStand,score_Special_min=1,score_Special=1] Timer 1
scoreboard players set @e[type=ArmorStand,score_Timer=25,score_Timer_min=25,score_Special_min=1,score_Special=1] Timer 1

timer setting
scoreboard players add @e[type=ArmorStand,score_Special_min=2,score_Special=2,score_Timer=7] Timer 1
scoreboard players add @e[type=ArmorStand,score_Special_min=3,score_Special=3] Timer 1


timer setting
scoreboard players add @e[type=ArmorStand,score_Special_min=4,score_Special=4] Timer 1
scoreboard players set @e[type=ArmorStand,score_Timer_min=6,score_Timer=6,score_Special_min=4,score_Special=4] Special 0


LegMovement
1 : 跑步(會控制左手)
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_TimerLeg=1,score_TimerLeg_min=1,score_LegMovement_min=1,score_LegMovement=1] {Pose:{LeftArm:[0f,0f,0f],LeftLeg:[0f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[0f,0f,0f]}}
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_TimerLeg=2,score_TimerLeg_min=2,score_LegMovement_min=1,score_LegMovement=1] {Pose:{LeftArm:[30f,0f,0f],LeftLeg:[30f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[-30f,0f,0f]}}
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_TimerLeg=3,score_TimerLeg_min=3,score_LegMovement_min=1,score_LegMovement=1] {Pose:{LeftArm:[60f,0f,0f],LeftLeg:[60f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[-60f,0f,0f]}}
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_TimerLeg=4,score_TimerLeg_min=4,score_LegMovement_min=1,score_LegMovement=1] {Pose:{LeftArm:[30f,0f,0f],LeftLeg:[30f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[-30f,0f,0f]}}
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_TimerLeg=5,score_TimerLeg_min=5,score_LegMovement_min=1,score_LegMovement=1] {Pose:{LeftArm:[0f,0f,0f],LeftLeg:[0f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[0f,0f,0f]}}
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_TimerLeg=6,score_TimerLeg_min=6,score_LegMovement_min=1,score_LegMovement=1] {Pose:{LeftArm:[-30f,0f,0f],LeftLeg:[-30f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[30f,0f,0f]}}
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_TimerLeg=7,score_TimerLeg_min=7,score_LegMovement_min=1,score_LegMovement=1] {Pose:{LeftArm:[-60f,0f,0f],LeftLeg:[-60f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[60f,0f,0f]}}
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_TimerLeg=8,score_TimerLeg_min=8,score_LegMovement_min=1,score_LegMovement=1] {Pose:{LeftArm:[-30f,0f,0f],LeftLeg:[-30f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[30f,0f,0f]}}

    



2 : 走路
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_TimerLeg=1,score_TimerLeg_min=1,score_LegMovement_min=2,score_LegMovement=2] {Pose:{LeftLeg:[0f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[0f,0f,0f]}}
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_TimerLeg=2,score_TimerLeg_min=2,score_LegMovement_min=2,score_LegMovement=2] {Pose:{LeftLeg:[-20f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[20f,0f,0f]}}
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_TimerLeg=3,score_TimerLeg_min=3,score_LegMovement_min=2,score_LegMovement=2] {Pose:{LeftLeg:[-40f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[40f,0f,0f]}}
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_TimerLeg=4,score_TimerLeg_min=4,score_LegMovement_min=2,score_LegMovement=2] {Pose:{LeftLeg:[-20f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[20f,0f,0f]}}
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_TimerLeg=5,score_TimerLeg_min=5,score_LegMovement_min=2,score_LegMovement=2] {Pose:{LeftLeg:[0f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[0f,0f,0f]}}
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_TimerLeg=6,score_TimerLeg_min=6,score_LegMovement_min=2,score_LegMovement=2] {Pose:{LeftLeg:[20f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[-20f,0f,0f]}}
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_TimerLeg=7,score_TimerLeg_min=7,score_LegMovement_min=2,score_LegMovement=2] {Pose:{LeftLeg:[40f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[-40f,0f,0f]}}
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_TimerLeg=8,score_TimerLeg_min=8,score_LegMovement_min=2,score_LegMovement=2] {Pose:{LeftLeg:[20f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[-20f,0f,0f]}}




3 : 閃避(向左,AS's)
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_TimerLeg=1,score_TimerLeg_min=1,score_LegMovement_min=3,score_LegMovement=3] {Pose:{Head:[0f,0f,0f],Body:[0f,0f,0f],LeftLeg:[0f,0f,-30f]}}
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_TimerLeg=2,score_TimerLeg_min=2,score_LegMovement_min=3,score_LegMovement=3] {Pose:{Head:[0f,0f,0f],Body:[0f,0f,0f],LeftLeg:[0f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[0f,0f,30f]}}
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_TimerLeg=3,score_TimerLeg_min=3,score_LegMovement_min=3,score_LegMovement=3] {Pose:{Head:[0f,0f,0f],Body:[0f,0f,0f],LeftLeg:[0f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[0f,0f,0f]}}

    


4 : 閃避(向右,AS's)
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_TimerLeg=1,score_TimerLeg_min=1,score_LegMovement_min=4,score_LegMovement=4] {Pose:{Head:[0f,0f,0f],Body:[0f,0f,0f],LeftLeg:[0f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[0f,0f,30f]}}
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_TimerLeg=2,score_TimerLeg_min=2,score_LegMovement_min=4,score_LegMovement=4] {Pose:{Head:[0f,0f,0f],Body:[0f,0f,0f],LeftLeg:[0f,0f,-30f],RightLeg:[0f,0f,0f]}}
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_TimerLeg=3,score_TimerLeg_min=3,score_LegMovement_min=4,score_LegMovement=4] {Pose:{Head:[0f,0f,0f],Body:[0f,0f,0f],LeftLeg:[0f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[0f,0f,0f]}}





HandMovement:
1 : 水平斬
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_Timer=1,score_Timer_min=1,score_HandMovement_min=1,score_HandMovement=1] {Pose:{RightArm:[-90f,0f,90f]}}
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_Timer=2,score_Timer_min=2,score_HandMovement_min=1,score_HandMovement=1] {Pose:{RightArm:[-75f,0f,90f]}}
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_Timer=3,score_Timer_min=3,score_HandMovement_min=1,score_HandMovement=1] {Pose:{RightArm:[-60f,0f,90f]}}
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_Timer=4,score_Timer_min=4,score_HandMovement_min=1,score_HandMovement=1] {Pose:{RightArm:[-45f,0f,90f]}}
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_Timer=5,score_Timer_min=5,score_HandMovement_min=1,score_HandMovement=1] {Pose:{RightArm:[-30f,0f,90f]}}
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_Timer=6,score_Timer_min=6,score_HandMovement_min=1,score_HandMovement=1] {Pose:{RightArm:[-15f,0f,90f]}}

    




2 : 拔劍術
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_Timer=1,score_Timer_min=1,score_HandMovement_min=2,score_HandMovement=2] {Pose:{LeftArm:[25f,0f,0f],RightArm:[-120f,0f,125f]}}
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_Timer=2,score_Timer_min=2,score_HandMovement_min=2,score_HandMovement=2] {Pose:{RightArm:[-110f,0f,125f]}}
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_Timer=3,score_Timer_min=3,score_HandMovement_min=2,score_HandMovement=2] {Pose:{RightArm:[-90f,0f,125f]}}
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_Timer=4,score_Timer_min=4,score_HandMovement_min=2,score_HandMovement=2] {Pose:{RightArm:[-70f,0f,125f]}}
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_Timer=5,score_Timer_min=5,score_HandMovement_min=2,score_HandMovement=2] {Pose:{RightArm:[-50f,0f,125f]}}
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_Timer=6,score_Timer_min=6,score_HandMovement_min=2,score_HandMovement=2] {Pose:{RightArm:[-30f,0f,125f]}}

    


3 : 打斜砍
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_Timer=1,score_Timer_min=1,score_HandMovement_min=3,score_HandMovement=3] {Pose:{RightArm:[-130f,0f,-50f]}}
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_Timer=2,score_Timer_min=2,score_HandMovement_min=3,score_HandMovement=3] {Pose:{RightArm:[-110f,0f,-50f]}}
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_Timer=3,score_Timer_min=3,score_HandMovement_min=3,score_HandMovement=3] {Pose:{RightArm:[-90f,0f,-50f]}}
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_Timer=4,score_Timer_min=4,score_HandMovement_min=3,score_HandMovement=3] {Pose:{RightArm:[-70f,0f,-50f]}}
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_Timer=5,score_Timer_min=5,score_HandMovement_min=3,score_HandMovement=3] {Pose:{RightArm:[-50f,0f,-50f]}}
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_Timer=6,score_Timer_min=6,score_HandMovement_min=3,score_HandMovement=3] {Pose:{RightArm:[-30f,0f,-50f]}}

    

4 : 垂直砍
entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,score_Timer=1,score_Timer_min=1,score_HandMovement_min=4,score_HandMovement=4] {Pose:{LeftArm:[-120f,40f,0f],RightArm:[-120f,-40f,15f],Head:[-20f,0f,0f]}}
